channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.description: #Hugo for my website config.toml is the configuration file. change the folder to the blog folder In cmd (MyBlog folder), input ‘hugo’ to generate the static webpages. then in the public folder, all contents should be added to github.io git add . git commit -m "" git push origin master references: https://w01fb0ss.github.io/2020/010/; https://keysaim.github.io/post/blog/2017-08-15-how-to-setup-your-github-io-blog/ https://keysaim.github.io/post/blog/deploy-hugo-blog-in-github.io/
